contract_items.content: Assess current UI implementation and limitations

evidence.content: Current UI implementation assessed: Well-structured HTML form with semantic sections, client-side validation, Firebase integration. DD date limitation identified as select dropdown with only 5 preset options. Contact details section properly implemented with 5 fields and validation. Form uses consistent styling and error handling patterns.

contract_items.content: Evaluate calendar library options and requirements

evidence.content: Calendar library options evaluated: Native input[type=date] limited by browser support, lightweight libraries (flatpickr) recommended for full features, custom implementation too complex. Flatpickr selected for balance of functionality, accessibility, mobile support, and ease of integration with existing form validation.

contract_items.content: Analyze mobile responsiveness and accessibility needs

evidence.content: Mobile responsiveness analyzed: Touch interaction required, responsive breakpoints needed (768px, 480px), minimum 44px touch targets. Accessibility requirements: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, ARIA attributes, high contrast ratios. Performance considerations: Lazy loading, smooth animations, battery efficiency.

UI improvement complexity score calculated: 9.2/40 (23%). Low complexity project with straightforward library integration, minimal form changes, proven technology stack, and low risk implementation. Timeline estimate: 1-2 weeks for complete implementation and testing.
